about.subtitle: Frontend Developer · Javascript | Typescript | Vuejs | HTML5 | CSS3 | Sass | Bootstrap
about.description:
Bachelor's Degree in Information Systems at Universidade Federal de Pernambuco (UFPE)
Professional background in Project Management and IT Entrepreneurship
Goal oriented & instructor focused on helping people start programming

experience.title: Senior Frontend Developer
experience.subtitle: Vert-Capital
experience.description: I worked for a Techfin company operating in the capital market, specializing in securitization. During my time there, I actively contributed to the development of the securitization platform and played a key role in implementing ESG and Anti-fraud websites. Additionally, I have experience working with Design Systems and Storybook, embracing an Agile culture. My technical skills include HTML5, CSS3, Typescript, JavaScript, Vue.js, Vue.js 3, Vuex, Vue-Router, ElementUI, Docker, Bootstrap, and Sass.

experience.title: Mid-level Frontend Developer
experience.subtitle: DuAgro
experience.description: I have actively contributed to the development of a fintech's platform that provides credit for agricultural input purchases. During this project, I played a key role in implementing the Design System and Storybook, fostering an Agile culture, and continuously working on refinements and improvements. My technical skills in this endeavor include HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, Vue.js, Vuex, ElementUI, and Docker.

experience.title: Mid-level Full-Stack Developer
experience.subtitle: TISaúde
experience.description: I have participated in the development of a clinical platform for patient care and engagement. Specifically, I worked on a platform that facilitated the management of doctors and patients. Additionally, I performed refactoring of PHP projects using Laravel and also have experience as a speaker on Agile Scrum methodology. Throughout the project, I utilized tools such as Bitbucket and Jira to ensure efficient collaboration and tracking of tasks. Embracing an Agile culture, I contributed to delivering high-quality software through iterative and collaborative development processes. In terms of my technical expertise, I have experience with HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, Vue.js, Vuex, Quasar, PHP, Laravel, and Docker.

experience.title: Junior Frontend Developer
experience.subtitle: Oig Capital
experience.description: I have participated in the development of an investment platform with over 10 years of experience, offering a robust infrastructure for investing in high-impact projects and the expertise to assist investors in diversifying their investments securely and efficiently. During this project, I contributed to the development of an investment platform, utilizing tools such as Trello and GitHub for effective project management and collaboration. Embracing an Agile culture, I fostered iterative development processes to ensure the delivery of a high-quality product. In terms of my technical skills, I am proficient in HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, Vue.js, Vuex, and Vuetify.

experience.title: Junior Frontend Developer
experience.subtitle: Santenergy Tild Technology
experience.description: I have actively contributed to the development of a cloud-based management software that assists companies in the Free Energy Market with information flow and daily activity control. Specifically, I participated in the development of a web-based system for managing the purchase and sale of imported energy by businesses. During this project, I utilized tools such as Jira and Github for efficient project management and collaboration. Embracing an Agile culture, I fostered iterative development processes to ensure the delivery of a high-quality system. In terms of my technical skills, I am proficient in HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, VueJS, Vuex, and Vuetify.

experience.title: Business consultant
experience.subtitle: Junior Company Trainee CITi-UFPE
experience.description: I was responsible for providing consulting services to Virtù Consultoria Política, the Junior Enterprise at UFPE, for the creation of a single web page. I worked on gathering requirements for the visual identity of the website, applying the Agile SCRUM methodology for managing team activities and deliverables. Additionally, I provided customer support and finalized the sale through a contract.

interests.subtitle: As a frontend developer, I am interested in creating the best experience through web application user interfaces, bringing a concept to life with frontend technologies.

  • Discover new places
  • Connect with people
